title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 3.11 - Delivery of checks to temporary and per diem employees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 3.11 - Delivery of checks to temporary and per diem employees

State Regulations

Whenever practicable, delivery of payroll checks to temporary
and per diem employees shall be made by someone other than the person charged
with the responsibility for the preparation of the payrolls, or the time
records on which such payrolls are based. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
3.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
